PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-03412022-04-06AAFC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) incorporate by reference a list of grains for which a declaration must be made and provided; and (2) remove the declaration requirements for certain grains that are not subject to varietal registration.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0077 Publication Date: 2022-04-27
AttachmentsAttachment
